1.text: Now Benjamin beget Bale his firstborn, Asbel the second, Ahara the third,

2.text: Nohaa the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

3.text: And the sons of Bale were Addar, and Gera, and Abiud,

4.text: And Abisue, and Naamar, and Ahoe,

5.text: And Gera, and Sephuphan, and Huram.

6.text: These are the sons of Ahod, heads of families that dwelt in Gabaa, who were removed into Mrtnahsth.

7.text: And Naaman, and Achia, and Gera he removed them, and beget Oza, and Ahiud.

8.text: And Saharim begot in the land of Moab, after he sent away Husim and Bara his wives.

9.text: And he beget of Hodes his wife Jobab, and Sebia, and Mesa, and Molchom,

10.text: And Jehus and Sechia, and Marma. These were his sons heads of their families.

11.text: And Mehusim beget Abitob, and Elphaal.

12.text: And the sons of Elphaal were Heber, and Misaam, and Samad: who built One, and Led, and its daughters.

13.text: And Baria, and Sama were heads of their kindreds that dwelt in Aialon: these drove away the inhabitants of Geth.

14.text: And Ahio, and Sesac, and Jerimoth,

15.text: And Zabadia, and Arod, and Heder,

16.text: And Michael, and Jespha, and Joha, the sons of Baria.

17.text: 17And Zabadia, and Mosollam, and Hezeci, and Heber,

18.text: And Jesamari, and Jezlia, and Jobab, sons of Elphaal,

19.text: And Jacim, and Zechri, and Zabdi,

20.text: And Elioenai, and Selethai, and Elial,

21.text: And Adaia, and Baraia, and Samareth, the sons of Semei.

22.text: And Jespham, and Heber, and Eliel,

23.text: And Abdon, and Zechri, and Hanan,

24.text: And Hanania, and Elam, and Anathothia.

25.text: And Jephdaia, and Phanuel the sons of Sesac.

26.text: And Samsari, and Sohoria and Otholia,

27.text: And Jersia, and Elia, and Zechri, the sons of Jeroham.

28.text: These were the chief fathers, and heads of their families who dwelt in Jerusalem.

29.text: And at Gabaon dwelt Abigabaon, and the name of his wife was Maacha:

30.text: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Sur, and Cia, and Baal, and Nadab,

31.text: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher, and Macelloth:

32.text: And Macelloth beget Samaa: and they dwelt over against their brethren in Jerusalem with their brethren.

33.text: And Ner begot Cia, and Cia begot Saul. And Saul begot Jonathan and Melchisua, and Abinadab, and Esbaal.

34.text: And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal: and Meribbaal begot Micha.

35.text: And the sons of Micha were Phithon, and Melech, and Tharaa, and Ahaz.

36.text: And Ahaz beget Joada: and Joada beget Alamath, and Azmoth, and Zamri: and Zamri beget Mesa,

37.text: And Mesa beget Banaa, whose son was Rapha, of whom was born Elasa, who beget Asel.

38.text: And Asel had six sons whose names were Ezricam, Bochru, Ismahel, Saria, Obdia, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Asel.

39.text: And the sons of Esec, his brother, were Ulam the firstborn, and Jehus the second, and Eliphelet the third.

40.text: And the sons of Ulam were most valiant men, and archers of great strength: and they had many sons and grandsons, even to a hundred and fifty. All these were children of Benjamin.
